00045 template<class T> T BasePhyLayer::readPar(const char* parName, const T defaultValue) const {
00046   if(hasPar(parName))
00047     return par(parName);
00048   return defaultValue;
00049 }
00050 
00051 // the following line is needed to allow linking when compiled in RELEASE mode.
00052 // Add a declaration for each parameterization of the template used in
00053 // code to be linked, e.g. in modules or in examples, if it is not already
00054 // used in base (double and simtime_t). Needed with (at least): gcc 4.4.1.
00055 template int BasePhyLayer::readPar<int>(const char* parName, const int) const;
00056 template double BasePhyLayer::readPar<double>(const char* parName, const double) const;
00057 template<> simtime_t BasePhyLayer::readPar<simtime_t>(const char* parName, const simtime_t defaultValue) const {
00058   if(hasPar(parName))
00059     return simtime_t( par(parName).doubleValue() );
00060   return defaultValue;
00061 }
00062 template bool BasePhyLayer::readPar<bool>(const char* parName, const bool) const;

00064 void BasePhyLayer::initialize(int stage) {
00065 
00066   ChannelAccess::initialize(stage);
00067 
00068   if (stage == 0) {
00069     // if using sendDirect, make sure that messages arrive without delay
00070     gate("radioIn")->setDeliverOnReceptionStart(true);
00071 
00072     //get gate ids
00073     upperLayerIn    = findGate("upperLayerIn");
00074     upperLayerOut   = findGate("upperLayerOut");
00075     upperControlOut = findGate("upperControlOut");
00076     upperControlIn  = findGate("upperControlIn");
00077 
00078     //read simple ned-parameters
00079     //  - initialize basic parameters
00080     if(par("useThermalNoise").boolValue()) {
00081       double thermalNoiseVal = FWMath::dBm2mW(par("thermalNoise").doubleValue());
00082       thermalNoise = new ConstantSimpleConstMapping(DimensionSet::timeDomain,
00083                               thermalNoiseVal);
00084     } else {
00085       thermalNoise = 0;
00086     }
00087     headerLength = par("headerLength").longValue();
00088     sensitivity = par("sensitivity").doubleValue();
00089     sensitivity = FWMath::dBm2mW(sensitivity);
00090     maxTXPower = par("maxTXPower").doubleValue();
00091 
00092     recordStats = par("recordStats").boolValue();
00093 
00094     //  - initialize radio
00095     radio = initializeRadio();
00096 
00097     // get pointer to the world module
00098     world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00099         if (world == NULL) {
00100             opp_error("Could not find BaseWorldUtility module");
00101         }
00102 
00103         if(cc->hasPar("sat")
00104        && (sensitivity - FWMath::dBm2mW(cc->par("sat").doubleValue())) < -0.000001) {
00105             opp_error("Sensitivity can't be smaller than the "
00106             "signal attenuation threshold (sat) in ConnectionManager. "
00107             "Please adjust your omnetpp.ini file accordingly.");
00108     }
00109 
00110 //  } else if (stage == 1){
00111     //read complex(xml) ned-parameters
00112     //  - analogue model parameters
00113     initializeAnalogueModels(par("analogueModels").xmlValue());
00114     //  - decider parameters
00115     initializeDecider(par("decider").xmlValue());
00116 
00117     //initialise timer messages
00118     radioSwitchingOverTimer = new cMessage("radio switching over", RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER);
00119     txOverTimer = new cMessage("transmission over", TX_OVER);
00120 
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 Radio* BasePhyLayer::initializeRadio() const {
00125   int initialRadioState = par("initialRadioState").longValue();
00126   double radioMinAtt = par("radioMinAtt").doubleValue();
00127   double radioMaxAtt = par("radioMaxAtt").doubleValue();
00128   int nbRadioChannels = readPar("nbRadioChannels", 1);
00129   int initialRadioChannel = readPar("initialRadioChannel", 0);
00130 
00131   Radio* radio = Radio::createNewRadio(recordStats, initialRadioState,
00132                      radioMinAtt, radioMaxAtt,
00133                      initialRadioChannel, nbRadioChannels);
00134 
00135   //  - switch times to TX
00136   //if no RX to TX defined asume same time as sleep to TX
00137   radio->setSwitchTime(Radio::RX, Radio::TX, (hasPar("timeRXToTX") ? par("timeRXToTX") : par("timeSleepToTX")).doubleValue());
00138   //if no sleep to TX defined asume same time as RX to TX
00139   radio->setSwitchTime(Radio::SLEEP, Radio::TX, (hasPar("timeSleepToTX") ? par("timeSleepToTX") : par("timeRXToTX")).doubleValue());
00140 
00141   //  - switch times to RX
00142   //if no TX to RX defined asume same time as sleep to RX
00143   radio->setSwitchTime(Radio::TX, Radio::RX, (hasPar("timeTXToRX") ? par("timeTXToRX") : par("timeSleepToRX")).doubleValue());
00144   //if no sleep to RX defined asume same time as TX to RX
00145   radio->setSwitchTime(Radio::SLEEP, Radio::RX, (hasPar("timeSleepToRX") ? par("timeSleepToRX") : par("timeTXToRX")).doubleValue());
00146 
00147   //  - switch times to sleep
00148   //if no TX to sleep defined asume same time as RX to sleep
00149   radio->setSwitchTime(Radio::TX, Radio::SLEEP, (hasPar("timeTXToSleep") ? par("timeTXToSleep") : par("timeRXToSleep")).doubleValue());
00150   //if no RX to sleep defined asume same time as TX to sleep
00151   radio->setSwitchTime(Radio::RX, Radio::SLEEP, (hasPar("timeRXToSleep") ? par("timeRXToSleep") : par("timeTXToSleep")).doubleValue());
00152 
00153   return radio;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void BasePhyLayer::getParametersFromXML(cXMLElement* xmlData, ParameterMap& outputMap) const {
00157   cXMLElementList parameters = xmlData->getElementsByTagName("Parameter");
00158 
00159   for(cXMLElementList::const_iterator it = parameters.begin();
00160     it != parameters.end(); it++) {
00161 
00162     const char* name = (*it)->getAttribute("name");
00163     const char* type = (*it)->getAttribute("type");
00164     const char* value = (*it)->getAttribute("value");
00165     if(name == 0 || type == 0 || value == 0) {
00166       ev << "Invalid parameter, could not find name, type or value." << endl;
00167       continue;
00168     }
00169 
00170     std::string sType = type;   //needed for easier comparision
00171     std::string sValue = value; //needed for easier comparision
00172 
00173     cMsgPar param(name);
00174 
00175     //parse type of parameter and set value
00176     if (sType == "bool") {
00177       param.setBoolValue(sValue == "true" || sValue == "1");
00178 
00179     } else if (sType == "double") {
00180       param.setDoubleValue(strtod(value, 0));
00181 
00182     } else if (sType == "string") {
00183       param.setStringValue(value);
00184 
00185     } else if (sType == "long") {
00186       param.setLongValue(strtol(value, 0, 0));
00187 
00188     } else {
00189       ev << "Unknown parameter type: \"" << sType << "\"" << endl;
00190       continue;
00191     }
00192 
00193     //add parameter to output map
00194     outputMap[name] = param;
00195   }
00196 }
00197 
00198 void BasePhyLayer::finish(){
00199   // give decider the chance to do something
00200   decider->finish();
00201 }

00205 
00206 void BasePhyLayer::initializeDecider(cXMLElement* xmlConfig) {
00207 
00208   decider = NULL;
00209 
00210   if(xmlConfig == NULL) {
00211     opp_error("No decider configuration file specified.");
00212     return;
00213   }
00214 
00215   cXMLElementList deciderList = xmlConfig->getElementsByTagName("Decider");
00216 
00217   if(deciderList.empty()) {
00218     opp_error("No decider configuration found in configuration file.");
00219     return;
00220   }
00221 
00222   if(deciderList.size() > 1) {
00223     opp_error("More than one decider configuration found in configuration file.");
00224     return;
00225   }
00226 
00227   cXMLElement* deciderData = deciderList.front();
00228 
00229   const char* name = deciderData->getAttribute("type");
00230 
00231   if(name == NULL) {
00232     opp_error("Could not read type of decider from configuration file.");
00233     return;
00234   }
00235 
00236   ParameterMap params;
00237   getParametersFromXML(deciderData, params);
00238 
00239   decider = getDeciderFromName(name, params);
00240 
00241   if(decider == NULL) {
00242     opp_error("Could not find a decider with the name \"%s\".", name);
00243     return;
00244   }
00245 
00246   coreEV << "Decider \"" << name << "\" loaded." << endl;
00247 }
00248 
00249 Decider* BasePhyLayer::getDeciderFromName(std::string /*name*/, ParameterMap& /*params*/)
00250 {
00251   return 0;
00252 }

00255 //-----AnalogueModels initialization----------------
00256 
00257 void BasePhyLayer::initializeAnalogueModels(cXMLElement* xmlConfig) {
00258 
00259   /*
00260   * first of all, attach the AnalogueModel that represents the RadioState
00261   * to the AnalogueModelList as first element.
00262   */
00263 
00264   std::string s("RadioStateAnalogueModel");
00265   ParameterMap p;
00266 
00267   AnalogueModel* newAnalogueModel = getAnalogueModelFromName(s, p);
00268 
00269   if(newAnalogueModel == 0)
00270   {
00271     opp_warning("Could not find an analogue model with the name \"%s\".", s.c_str());
00272   }
00273   else
00274   {
00275     analogueModels.push_back(newAnalogueModel);
00276   }
00277 
00278 
00279   if(xmlConfig == 0) {
00280     opp_warning("No analogue models configuration file specified.");
00281     return;
00282   }
00283 
00284   cXMLElementList analogueModelList = xmlConfig->getElementsByTagName("AnalogueModel");
00285 
00286   if(analogueModelList.empty()) {
00287     opp_warning("No analogue models configuration found in configuration file.");
00288     return;
00289   }
00290 
00291   // iterate over all AnalogueModel-entries, get a new AnalogueModel instance and add
00292   // it to analogueModels
00293   for(cXMLElementList::const_iterator it = analogueModelList.begin();
00294     it != analogueModelList.end(); it++) {
00295 
00296 
00297     cXMLElement* analogueModelData = *it;
00298 
00299     const char* name = analogueModelData->getAttribute("type");
00300 
00301     if(name == 0) {
00302       opp_warning("Could not read name of analogue model.");
00303       continue;
00304     }
00305 
00306     ParameterMap params;
00307     getParametersFromXML(analogueModelData, params);
00308 
00309     AnalogueModel* newAnalogueModel = getAnalogueModelFromName(name, params);
00310 
00311     if(newAnalogueModel == 0) {
00312       opp_warning("Could not find an analogue model with the name \"%s\".", name);
00313       continue;
00314     }
00315 
00316     // attach the new AnalogueModel to the AnalogueModelList
00317     analogueModels.push_back(newAnalogueModel);
00318 
00319     coreEV << "AnalogueModel \"" << name << "\" loaded." << endl;
00320 
00321   } // end iterator loop
00322 
00323 
00324 }
00325 
00326 AnalogueModel* BasePhyLayer::getAnalogueModelFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& /*params*/) const {
00327 
00328   // add default analogue models here
00329 
00330   // case "RSAM", pointer is valid as long as the radio exists
00331   if (name == "RadioStateAnalogueModel")
00332   {
00333     return radio->getAnalogueModel();
00334   }
00335 
00336   return 0;
00337 }
00338 
00339 //--Message handling--------------------------------------
00340 
00341 void BasePhyLayer::handleMessage(cMessage* msg) {
00342 
00343   //self messages
00344   if(msg->isSelfMessage()) {
00345     handleSelfMessage(msg);
00346 
00347   //MacPkts <- MacToPhyControlInfo
00348   } else if(msg->getArrivalGateId() == upperLayerIn) {
00349     handleUpperMessage(msg);
00350 
00351   //controlmessages
00352   } else if(msg->getArrivalGateId() == upperControlIn) {
00353     handleUpperControlMessage(msg);
00354 
00355   //AirFrames
00356   } else if(msg->getKind() == AIR_FRAME){
00357     handleAirFrame(static_cast<AirFrame*>(msg));
00358 
00359   //unknown message
00360   } else {
00361     ev << "Unknown message received." << endl;
00362     delete msg;
00363   }
00364 }
00365 
00366 void BasePhyLayer::handleAirFrame(AirFrame* frame) {
00367   //TODO: ask jerome to set air frame priority in his UWBIRPhy
00368   //assert(frame->getSchedulingPriority() == airFramePriority);
00369 
00370   switch(frame->getState()) {
00371   case START_RECEIVE:
00372     handleAirFrameStartReceive(frame);
00373     break;
00374 
00375   case RECEIVING: {
00376     handleAirFrameReceiving(frame);
00377     break;
00378   }
00379   case END_RECEIVE:
00380     handleAirFrameEndReceive(frame);
00381     break;
00382 
00383   default:
00384     opp_error( "Unknown AirFrame state: %s", frame->getState());
00385     break;
00386   }
00387 }
00388 
00389 void BasePhyLayer::handleAirFrameStartReceive(AirFrame* frame) {
00390   coreEV << "Received new AirFrame " << frame << " from channel." << endl;
00391 
00392   if(channelInfo.isChannelEmpty()) {
00393     radio->setTrackingModeTo(true);
00394   }
00395 
00396   channelInfo.addAirFrame(frame, simTime());
00397   assert(!channelInfo.isChannelEmpty());
00398 
00399   if(usePropagationDelay) {
00400     Signal& s = frame->getSignal();
00401     simtime_t delay = simTime() - s.getSendingStart();
00402     s.setPropagationDelay(delay);
00403   }
00404   assert(frame->getSignal().getReceptionStart() == simTime());
00405 
00406   frame->getSignal().setReceptionSenderInfo(frame);
00407   filterSignal(frame);
00408 
00409   if(decider && isKnownProtocolId(frame->getProtocolId())) {
00410     frame->setState(RECEIVING);
00411 
00412     //pass the AirFrame the first time to the Decider
00413     handleAirFrameReceiving(frame);
00414 
00415   //if no decider is defined we will schedule the message directly to its end
00416   } else {
00417     Signal& signal = frame->getSignal();
00418 
00419     simtime_t signalEndTime = signal.getReceptionStart() + frame->getDuration();
00420     frame->setState(END_RECEIVE);
00421 
00422     sendSelfMessage(frame, signalEndTime);
00423   }
00424 }
00425 
00426 void BasePhyLayer::handleAirFrameReceiving(AirFrame* frame) {
00427 
00428   Signal&   signal         = frame->getSignal();
00429   simtime_t nextHandleTime = decider->processSignal(frame);
00430 
00431   assert(signal.getDuration() == frame->getDuration());
00432   simtime_t signalEndTime = signal.getReceptionStart() + frame->getDuration();
00433 
00434   //check if this is the end of the receiving process
00435   if(simTime() >= signalEndTime) {
00436     frame->setState(END_RECEIVE);
00437     handleAirFrameEndReceive(frame);
00438     return;
00439   }
00440 
00441   //smaller zero means don't give it to me again
00442   if(nextHandleTime < 0) {
00443     nextHandleTime = signalEndTime;
00444     frame->setState(END_RECEIVE);
00445 
00446   //invalid point in time
00447   } else if(nextHandleTime < simTime() || nextHandleTime > signalEndTime) {
00448     opp_error("Invalid next handle time returned by Decider. Expected a value between current simulation time (%.2f) and end of signal (%.2f) but got %.2f",
00449                 SIMTIME_DBL(simTime()), SIMTIME_DBL(signalEndTime), SIMTIME_DBL(nextHandleTime));
00450   }
00451 
00452   coreEV << "Handed AirFrame with ID " << frame->getId() << " to Decider. Next handling in " << nextHandleTime - simTime() << "s." << endl;
00453 
00454   sendSelfMessage(frame, nextHandleTime);
00455 }
00456 
00457 void BasePhyLayer::handleAirFrameEndReceive(AirFrame* frame) {
00458   coreEV << "End of Airframe with ID " << frame->getId() << "." << endl;
00459 
00460   simtime_t earliestInfoPoint = channelInfo.removeAirFrame(frame);
00461 
00462   /* clean information in the radio until earliest time-point
00463   *  of information in the ChannelInfo,
00464   *  since this time-point might have changed due to removal of
00465   *  the AirFrame
00466   */
00467   if(channelInfo.isChannelEmpty()) {
00468     earliestInfoPoint = simTime();
00469     radio->setTrackingModeTo(false);
00470   }
00471 
00472   radio->cleanAnalogueModelUntil(earliestInfoPoint);
00473 }
00474 
00475 void BasePhyLayer::handleUpperMessage(cMessage* msg){
00476 
00477   // check if Radio is in TX state
00478   if (radio->getCurrentState() != Radio::TX)
00479   {
00480         delete msg;
00481         msg = 0;
00482     opp_error("Error: message for sending received, but radio not in state TX");
00483   }
00484 
00485   // check if not already sending
00486   if(txOverTimer->isScheduled())
00487   {
00488         delete msg;
00489         msg = 0;
00490     opp_error("Error: message for sending received, but radio already sending");
00491   }
00492 
00493   // build the AirFrame to send
00494   assert(dynamic_cast<cPacket*>(msg) != 0);
00495 
00496   AirFrame* frame = encapsMsg(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00497 
00498   // make sure there is no self message of kind TX_OVER scheduled
00499   // and schedule the actual one
00500   assert (!txOverTimer->isScheduled());
00501   sendSelfMessage(txOverTimer, simTime() + frame->getDuration());
00502 
00503   sendMessageDown(frame);
00504 }
00505 
00506 AirFrame *BasePhyLayer::encapsMsg(cPacket *macPkt)
00507 {
00508   // the cMessage passed must be a MacPacket... but no cast needed here
00509   // MacPkt* pkt = static_cast<MacPkt*>(msg);
00510 
00511   // ...and must always have a ControlInfo attached (contains Signal)
00512   cObject* ctrlInfo = macPkt->removeControlInfo();
00513   assert(ctrlInfo);
00514 
00515   // create the new AirFrame
00516   AirFrame* frame = new AirFrame(macPkt->getName(), AIR_FRAME);
00517 
00518   // Retrieve the pointer to the Signal-instance from the ControlInfo-instance.
00519   // We are now the new owner of this instance.
00520   Signal* s = MacToPhyControlInfo::getSignalFromControlInfo(ctrlInfo);
00521   // make sure we really obtained a pointer to an instance
00522   assert(s);
00523 
00524   // set the members
00525   assert(s->getDuration() > 0);
00526   frame->setDuration(s->getDuration());
00527   // copy the signal into the AirFrame
00528   frame->setSignal(*s);
00529   //set priority of AirFrames above the normal priority to ensure
00530   //channel consistency (before any thing else happens at a time
00531   //point t make sure that the channel has removed every AirFrame
00532   //ended at t and added every AirFrame started at t)
00533   frame->setSchedulingPriority(airFramePriority);
00534   frame->setProtocolId(myProtocolId());
00535   frame->setBitLength(headerLength);
00536   frame->setId(world->getUniqueAirFrameId());
00537   frame->setChannel(radio->getCurrentChannel());
00538 
00539 
00540   // pointer and Signal not needed anymore
00541   delete s;
00542   s = 0;
00543 
00544   // delete the Control info
00545   delete ctrlInfo;
00546   ctrlInfo = 0;
00547 
00548   frame->encapsulate(macPkt);
00549 
00550   // --- from here on, the AirFrame is the owner of the MacPacket ---
00551   macPkt = 0;
00552   coreEV <<"AirFrame encapsulated, length: " << frame->getBitLength() << "\n";
00553 
00554   return frame;
00555 }
00556 
00557 void BasePhyLayer::handleChannelSenseRequest(cMessage* msg) {
00558   ChannelSenseRequest* senseReq = static_cast<ChannelSenseRequest*>(msg);
00559 
00560   simtime_t nextHandleTime = decider->handleChannelSenseRequest(senseReq);
00561 
00562   if(nextHandleTime >= simTime()) { //schedule request for next handling
00563     sendSelfMessage(msg, nextHandleTime);
00564 
00565     //don't throw away any AirFrames while ChannelSenseRequest is active
00566     if(!channelInfo.isRecording()) {
00567       channelInfo.startRecording(simTime());
00568     }
00569   } else if(nextHandleTime >= 0.0){
00570     opp_error("Next handle time of ChannelSenseRequest returned by the Decider is smaller then current simulation time: %.2f",
00571         SIMTIME_DBL(nextHandleTime));
00572   }
00573 
00574   // else, i.e. nextHandleTime < 0.0, the Decider doesn't want to handle
00575   // the request again
00576 }
00577 
00578 void BasePhyLayer::handleUpperControlMessage(cMessage* msg){
00579 
00580   switch(msg->getKind()) {
00581     case CHANNEL_SENSE_REQUEST:
00582       handleChannelSenseRequest(msg);
00583       break;
00584     default:
00585       ev << "Received unknown control message from upper layer!" << endl;
00586       break;
00587   }
00588 }
00589 
00590 void BasePhyLayer::handleSelfMessage(cMessage* msg) {
00591 
00592   switch(msg->getKind()) {
00593   //transmission over
00594   case TX_OVER:
00595     assert(msg == txOverTimer);
00596     sendControlMsgToMac(new cMessage("Transmission over", TX_OVER));
00597     break;
00598 
00599   //radio switch over
00600   case RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER:
00601     assert(msg == radioSwitchingOverTimer);
00602     finishRadioSwitching();
00603     break;
00604 
00605   //AirFrame
00606   case AIR_FRAME:
00607     handleAirFrame(static_cast<AirFrame*>(msg));
00608     break;
00609 
00610   //ChannelSenseRequest
00611   case CHANNEL_SENSE_REQUEST:
00612     handleChannelSenseRequest(msg);
00613     break;
00614 
00615   default:
00616     break;
00617   }
00618 }
00619 
00620 //--Send messages------------------------------

00622 void BasePhyLayer::sendControlMessageUp(cMessage* msg) {
00623   send(msg, upperControlOut);
00624 }
00625 
00626 void BasePhyLayer::sendMacPktUp(cMessage* pkt) {
00627   send(pkt, upperLayerOut);
00628 }
00629 
00630 void BasePhyLayer::sendMessageDown(AirFrame* msg) {
00631 
00632   sendToChannel(msg);
00633 }
00634 
00635 void BasePhyLayer::sendSelfMessage(cMessage* msg, simtime_t_cref time) {
00636   //TODO: maybe delete this method because it doesn't makes much sense,
00637   //    or change it to "scheduleIn(msg, timeDelta)" which schedules
00638   //    a message to +timeDelta from current time
00639   scheduleAt(time, msg);
00640 }
00641 
00642 
00643 void BasePhyLayer::filterSignal(AirFrame *frame) {
00644   if (analogueModels.empty())
00645     return;
00646 
00647   ChannelAccess *const senderModule   = dynamic_cast<ChannelAccess *const>(frame->getSenderModule());
00648   ChannelAccess *const receiverModule = dynamic_cast<ChannelAccess *const>(frame->getArrivalModule());
00649   //const simtime_t      sStart         = frame->getSignal().getReceptionStart();
00650 
00651   assert(senderModule); assert(receiverModule);
00652 
00654   ChannelMobilityPtrType sendersMobility  = senderModule   ? senderModule->getMobilityModule()   : NULL;
00655   ChannelMobilityPtrType receiverMobility = receiverModule ? receiverModule->getMobilityModule() : NULL;
00656 
00657   const Coord sendersPos  = sendersMobility  ? sendersMobility->getCurrentPosition(/*sStart*/) : NoMobiltyPos;
00658   const Coord receiverPos = receiverMobility ? receiverMobility->getCurrentPosition(/*sStart*/): NoMobiltyPos;
00659 
00660   for(AnalogueModelList::const_iterator it = analogueModels.begin(); it != analogueModels.end(); ++it)
00661     (*it)->filterSignal(frame, sendersPos, receiverPos);
00662 }
00663 
00664 //--Destruction--------------------------------
00665 
00666 BasePhyLayer::~BasePhyLayer() {
00667   //get AirFrames from ChannelInfo and delete
00668   //(although ChannelInfo normally owns the AirFrames it
00669   //is not able to cancel and delete them itself
00670   AirFrameVector channel;
00671   channelInfo.getAirFrames(0, simTime(), channel);
00672 
00673   for(AirFrameVector::iterator it = channel.begin();
00674     it != channel.end(); ++it)
00675   {
00676     cancelAndDelete(*it);
00677   }
00678 
00679   //free timer messages
00680   if(txOverTimer) {
00681     cancelAndDelete(txOverTimer);
00682   }
00683   if(radioSwitchingOverTimer) {
00684         cancelAndDelete(radioSwitchingOverTimer);
00685   }
00686 
00687   //free thermal noise mapping
00688   if(thermalNoise) {
00689     delete thermalNoise;
00690   }
00691 
00692   //free Decider
00693   if(decider != 0) {
00694     delete decider;
00695   }
00696 
00697   /*
00698    * get a pointer to the radios RSAM again to avoid deleting it,
00699    * it is not created by calling new (BasePhyLayer is not the owner)!
00700    */
00701   AnalogueModel* rsamPointer = radio ? radio->getAnalogueModel() : NULL;
00702 
00703   //free AnalogueModels
00704   for(AnalogueModelList::const_iterator it = analogueModels.begin();
00705     it != analogueModels.end(); ++it) {
00706 
00707     AnalogueModelList::value_type tmp = *it;
00708 
00709     // do not delete the RSAM, it's not allocated by new!
00710     if (tmp == rsamPointer) {
00711       rsamPointer = 0;
00712       continue;
00713     }
00714 
00715     if(tmp != 0) {
00716       delete tmp;
00717     }
00718   }
00719 
00720 
00721   // free radio
00722   if(radio != 0) {
00723     delete radio;
00724   }
00725 }
00726 
00727 //--MacToPhyInterface implementation-----------------------
00728 
00729 int BasePhyLayer::getRadioState() const {
00730   Enter_Method_Silent();
00731   assert(radio);
00732   return radio->getCurrentState();
00733 }
00734 
00735 void BasePhyLayer::finishRadioSwitching()
00736 {
00737   radio->endSwitch(simTime());
00738   sendControlMsgToMac(new cMessage("Radio switching over", RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER));
00739 }
00740 
00741 simtime_t BasePhyLayer::setRadioState(int rs) {
00742   Enter_Method_Silent();
00743   assert(radio);
00744 
00745   if(txOverTimer && txOverTimer->isScheduled()) {
00746     opp_warning("Switched radio while sending an AirFrame. The effects this would have on the transmission are not simulated by the BasePhyLayer!");
00747   }
00748 
00749   simtime_t switchTime = radio->switchTo(rs, simTime());
00750 
00751   //invalid switch time, we are probably already switching
00752   if(switchTime < 0)
00753     return switchTime;
00754 
00755   // if switching is done in exactly zero-time no extra self-message is scheduled
00756   if (switchTime == 0.0)
00757   {
00758     // TODO: in case of zero-time-switch, send no control-message to mac!
00759     // maybe call a method finishRadioSwitchingSilent()
00760     finishRadioSwitching();
00761   } else
00762   {
00763     sendSelfMessage(radioSwitchingOverTimer, simTime() + switchTime);
00764   }
00765 
00766   return switchTime;
00767 }
00768 
00769 ChannelState BasePhyLayer::getChannelState() const {
00770   Enter_Method_Silent();
00771   assert(decider);
00772   return decider->getChannelState();
00773 }
00774 
00775 int BasePhyLayer::getPhyHeaderLength() const {
00776   Enter_Method_Silent();
00777   if (headerLength < 0)
00778     return par("headerLength").longValue();
00779   return headerLength;
00780 }
00781 
00782 void BasePhyLayer::setCurrentRadioChannel(int newRadioChannel) {
00783   if(txOverTimer && txOverTimer->isScheduled()) {
00784     opp_warning("Switched channel while sending an AirFrame. The effects this would have on the transmission are not simulated by the BasePhyLayer!");
00785   }
00786 
00787   radio->setCurrentChannel(newRadioChannel);
00788   decider->channelChanged(newRadioChannel);
00789   coreEV << "Switched radio to channel " << newRadioChannel << endl;
00790 }
00791 
00792 int BasePhyLayer::getCurrentRadioChannel() const {
00793   return radio->getCurrentChannel();
00794 }
00795 
00796 int BasePhyLayer::getNbRadioChannels() const {
00797   return par("nbRadioChannels");
00798 }

00802 void BasePhyLayer::getChannelInfo(simtime_t_cref from, simtime_t_cref to, AirFrameVector& out) const {
00803   channelInfo.getAirFrames(from, to, out);
00804 }
00805 
00806 ConstMapping* BasePhyLayer::getThermalNoise(simtime_t_cref from, simtime_t_cref /*to*/) {
00807   if(thermalNoise)
00808     thermalNoise->initializeArguments(Argument(from));
00809 
00810   return thermalNoise;
00811 }
00812 
00813 void BasePhyLayer::sendControlMsgToMac(cMessage* msg) {
00814   if(msg->getKind() == CHANNEL_SENSE_REQUEST) {
00815     if(channelInfo.isRecording()) {
00816       channelInfo.stopRecording();
00817     }
00818   }
00819   sendControlMessageUp(msg);
00820 }
00821 
00822 void BasePhyLayer::sendUp(AirFrame* frame, DeciderResult* result) {
00823 
00824   coreEV << "Decapsulating MacPacket from Airframe with ID " << frame->getId() << " and sending it up to MAC." << endl;
00825 
00826   cMessage* packet = frame->decapsulate();
00827 
00828   assert(packet);
00829 
00830   setUpControlInfo(packet, result);
00831 
00832   sendMacPktUp(packet);
00833 }
00834 
00835 simtime_t BasePhyLayer::getSimTime() const {
00836 
00837   return simTime();
00838 }
00839 
00840 void BasePhyLayer::cancelScheduledMessage(cMessage* msg) {
00841   if(msg->isScheduled()){
00842     cancelEvent(msg);
00843   } else {
00844     EV << "Warning: Decider wanted to cancel a scheduled message but message"
00845        << " wasn't actually scheduled. Message is: " << msg << endl;
00846   }
00847 }
00848 
00849 void BasePhyLayer::rescheduleMessage(cMessage* msg, simtime_t_cref t) {
00850   cancelScheduledMessage(msg);
00851   scheduleAt(t, msg);
00852 }

00854 void BasePhyLayer::drawCurrent(double amount, int activity) {
00855   BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(amount, activity);
00856 }

00858 BaseWorldUtility* BasePhyLayer::getWorldUtility() const {
00859   return world;
00860 }

00862 void BasePhyLayer::recordScalar(const char *name, double value, const char *unit) {
00863   ChannelAccess::recordScalar(name, value, unit);
00864 }
00865 
00869 cObject* BasePhyLayer::setUpControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, DeciderResult *const pDeciderResult)
00870 {
00871   return PhyToMacControlInfo::setControlInfo(pMsg, pDeciderResult);
00872 }
